Clean Room is your fundamental legal shield against Rompa
Document every step in R&D Log - it's your proof of independence
Remember: confidentiality clause (Art. 11) applies indefinitely
Contractual penalty: €2500 immediately, without notice
Your general skills are free - rest requires Waiver
Don't use CAD drawings from ITB - create new from scratch
Your PLC programming knowledge belongs to you - document external sources
Art. 11 protects everything not publicly available
Full damages can exceed €150,000 - don't risk it
Always be ready to prove parameters come from Cremer course, not ITB
Analyze VSO - last moment to negotiate Art. 11 release
Never contact ITB clients - build own B2C and car club base
Return all documents and equipment to Rompa "ongevraagd"
Art. 10 states: your work inventions belong to Rompa - be aware
Using ready-made feedstocks (BASF Catamold) is safe, ITB recipes - not
Register with KVK under neutral name before Rompa monitors you
Consult lawyer (€650 from Social Plan) - it's mandatory
Use €1500 budget for certificates: SolidWorks and ISO 9001
Limiting damages to 6 months gross salary is worth fighting for
Don't sign VSO in 7 days - you have 14 days reflection period
Market Carve-Out is your legal armor
Rompa's silence is strategic victory (Estoppel)
Never use Rompa's documentation, drawings or parameters
Formal Notification to Rompa is insurance policy for €0
Market Carve-Out eliminates 80% legal risk
Capital is severance pay (up to €40k per person) - use for start, not legal fight
UWV Startersperiode: 6 months financial buffer - use wisely
Transform training budget (€1,500) into business and sales competencies
Make Rompa formal offer to buy tooling for fraction of book value
Scrapping is rational for Rompa - eliminates competition
Oldtimers is your Market Carve-Out strategy - safe B2C start
Build company on trust and coordination, not Rompa's chaos
Don't wait for Rompa's help - build without them
Your mission: convince team success is possible without Rompa
Stop asking for permission - start acting on free will
Verify market: without 2-3 ready clients, business makes no sense
Inventory machines noting serial numbers and online valuation
If Rompa refuses to sell, look for used on Machineseeker
B.V. (LLC) gives limited liability - consider for large investments
B2B sales and management - key competency gaps to fill
Show Hans: your workshop is stable rent and you're Caretaker 24/7
Use paid month off before contract ends for B.V. registration
Don't let Rompa consider your vision as "preparing competition"
Weekly core team meetings: facts, not emotions
Your plan must be realistic: 6-12 months to first revenues
Quick small wins build team trust
ZZP network is flexible alternative to large employment
Use training budget for SME Management and Entrepreneur Finance courses
You don't need their machines to make money - you need clients
Hans' classic renovation can be Proof of Concept
Feel best in industrial automation, finding faults and reliability planning
Modernize PLC controller so old MIM furnaces can work for years
MIM furnaces have very simple construction - repair with proper materials
In vacuum furnaces, vacuum doesn't always equal cleanliness
Ideal debinding process requires active gas purge after cycle
Add Cold-Trap and gas line insulation to avoid acid condensation
Graphite liner in hot-zone stabilizes thermal and improves sintering

Use MIM furnaces for prototyping, R&D sintering: €200-600 per cycle
Don't repair as it was before failure - fix systemic error
In MIM furnaces, formaldehyde and acid dirty machine's "lungs"
Use Elino PLC controller to modernize MIM temperature control
Control flue gas composition and burner temperature for effective acid burning

MIM furnaces are laboratory for high temperature and controlled atmosphere
I see technical constraints and business opportunity in every project
Thermal cleaning services for industrial tooling: stable, repeatable income
Your technical knowledge + Hans strategic contacts = complementary success
Want to develop tech ideas related to MIM like ITB once did
Don't like doing senseless things - find plan that gives motivation
CoolFlow: 25% energy savings in 30 days - that's real KPI
VibeLog: Monitor machine pulse before heart stops

Automation is my passion - routine is slow death
I don't repair - I modernize
Anger and frustration are normal, but can't be strategy foundation
Rompa deliberately creates chaos to divide you and prevent competition
Change narrative: stop being Victim, become Creator of New Company
ADHD is Pattern Recognition - connect dots and predict their moves
Making you feel worthless is Rompa's manipulation element
Their "help" means: find job elsewhere, don't compete with Rompa CZ
Your value isn't in building or machines, but in know-how you take
Call reputation pressure on management before they reveal documents
Don't get pulled into mental loop - Rompa isn't your problem
Build new goal - not necessarily own company, but something meaningful
Even if Rompa scraps everything, you can buy used machines and succeed

Organized action paralyzes management's plan assuming chaos
Work on Hans' project to gain trust and workplace
Be flexible - oldtimers are start, industrial automation is goal
Show Hans you have detailed scenarios and can analyze risks
You already have advantage - they don't know you see their manipulation
Your success is only thing that defeats them
If Rompa consciously chooses loss option, violates duty of care
Rejecting profitable offer proves: Rompa protects CZ, not ITB NL
You're Strategic Problem Solver - see business, not just tech
Always have Plan B ready: Machineseeker and alternative building
Formal asset purchase proposal must be made by established B.V.
Focus on small batches and high margin
If Rompa refuses, demand written justification why they choose loss over profit
Thinking alone doesn't create prototypes - action creates momentum

Don't wait for someone to tell you what to do - leader creates own plan

Execution counts, not ideas - ideas became commodity
Most important thing you can do tomorrow: start acting today
Courage to start is greatest difference between success and failure

If you can't figure something out, improve and fix it
Rompa is slow Tank, you and AI are fast Drone
AI isn't cheating - it's tool for democratizing expert knowledge
Solo Founder with AI beats corporations

Control over time and vision more valuable than stable salary
Don't look for job - look for problems to solve

Passion > Paycheck - authentic power of DAREMON
